title: OXO Microfiber Floor Duster
description: Dust bunnies beware! The OXO Good Grips Microfiber Floor Duster has a wide 14” head that makes dusting large areas quick and easy. The aluminum pole is lightweight for easy maneuvering, and the double-jointed head makes it easy to get around furniture and into narrow spaces. The durable microfiber material traps and holds dust without the use of additional cleaning chemicals. For best results, wash the microfiber head in cold water without fabric softener or bleach and dry without using heat. The Duster is machine-washable.

asset.author: OXO

transcripts: Dust bunnies beware, we're gonna stop you from multiplying. The OXO microfiber duster has a wide 14 inch head that makes dusting larger areas quick and easy. The aluminum pole is light weight for maneuvering and the double jointed head makes it easy to get around furniture and into narrow spaces. The durable microfiber material traps and holds dust without additional cleaning chemicals, for best results wash the microfiber head with cold water without fabric softener or bleach, and dry without using heat, the duster is machine washable. Here's a good tip this broom features an extra large handle so you don't have to bend over while sweeping.
